entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
